transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
+20% Ally Team Health
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.5_1:
ATK DEF HP +22%
When using Ticking Clockwork, Changes to Dual Attack with 2 allies
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
At the start of battle, seals extra skill of all enemies by 1 turn (Ignores Resilience)
+25 Action Points at the start of battle

SKT_FIRST.name: Ticking Clockwork
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy. Heals the ally with the lowest Health by <color=#28d9ed>5%</color> of Eva’s Max Health.\nActivates a <color=#28d9ed>Dual Attack</color> from the ally with the highest Attack.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Effects are applied to all allies

SKT_BURST_2.effect: +70 Action Points to Target (Excluding the caster)

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changes to Enhanced Skill\nRemoves all debuffs\nIncreases Revival duration by 2 turns

description: Attacks an enemy. Heals the ally with the lowest Health by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000084_1_1]</color> of Evaâs Max Health.\nActivates a <color=#28d9ed>Dual Attack</color> from the ally with the highest Attack.

SKT_SECOND.name: Time Dilation
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Passive Effect) Cannot be inflicted with Frozen or Silenced.\n(Triggered Effect) When an ally is inflicted with a <color=#28d9ed>debuff</color>, activates an <color=#28d9ed>Agile Response</color>.\nWhen Agile Response is activated, reduces the duration of all <color=#28d9ed>debuff(s)</color> inflicted on allies by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn</color> and inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Seal Extra Skill</color> on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>. The enemy's Counterattack, Revenge, and Agile Response cannot activate immediately after using this skill.
description: (Passive Effect) Cannot be inflicted with Frozen or Silenced.\n(Triggered Effect) When an ally is inflicted with a <color=#28d9ed>debuff</color>, activates an <color=#28d9ed>Agile Response</color>.\nWhen Agile Response is activated, reduces the duration of all <color=#28d9ed>debuff(s)</color> inflicted on allies by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn</color> and inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Seal Extra Skill</color> on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000084_2_3] turn(s)</color>. The enemy's Counterattack, Revenge, and Agile Response cannot activate immediately after using this skill.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Dreaming of You
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: <color=#28d9ed>Heals</color> all allies for <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> of Eva's Max Health and increases <color=#28d9ed>Speed</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
description: <color=#28d9ed>Heals</color> all allies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000084_3_3]</color> of Eva's Max Health and increases <color=#28d9ed>Speed</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000084_3_2] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: After attacking, additionally reduces Weakness Gauge by <color=#28d9ed>5</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, recovers the <color=#28d9ed>Health</color> of the ally with the lowest Health by <color=#28d9ed>13%</color> of Eva's Max Health.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: After attacking, additionally reduces Weakness Gauge by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000084_chain_1_1]</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, recovers the <color=#28d9ed>Health</color> of the ally with the lowest Health by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000084_backup_1_1]</color> of Eva's Max Health.
